CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 28, 1955, pg. 19 reads: "Flamingo Hotel Celebrating 9th Anniversary...Eugene (Shorty) Mason, Lottie S. Johnson, and Roy Hamilton...bartender."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Flamingo Hotel staff, left to right: Eugene (Shorty) Mason, Lottie S. Johnson, and bartender Roy Hamilton, standing against light colored wall
